### 5E2

$$

d_A \sim Normal(\mu, \sigma) \\

\mu_i = \alpha + \beta_{lat} * lat_i + \beta_d_P * d_P_i \\

\alpha \sim Normal(0, 5) \\

\beta_{lat} \sim Normal(0, 10) \\

\beta_d_P \sim Normal(0, 10) \\

\sigma \sim Uniform(0, 50)

$$

\beta_{fund} \sim Normal(0, 10) \\

\sigma \sim Uniform(0, 50)
